cf.AuxiliaryCoordinate.setprop¶

AuxiliaryCoordinate.setprop(prop, value)[source]¶

Set a CF property.

See also

delprop, getprop, hasprop

Parameters:
prop : str

The name of the CF property.

value :

The value for the property.
Returns:

None
Examples: 
>>> c.setprop('standard_name', 'time')
>>> c.setprop('foo', 12.5)
